topic: Uncovering the heart of my Nana’s saltwater stories

ideas.title: The Great Pier Heist
ideas.premise: Nana recounts a 'fishing trip' at St Kilda Pier that was actually an elaborate plan to steal the best calamari from unsuspecting tourists.
ideas.why_funny: Nana's sweet facade hides a mischievous, calamari-obsessed criminal mastermind.

ideas.title: Fairy Penguins' Revenge
ideas.premise: Nana's saltwater stories reveal that the St Kilda penguins are secretly plotting revenge on humans for stealing their fish.
ideas.why_funny: Cute penguins planning elaborate, yet poorly executed, acts of vengeance.

ideas.title: The Yarra Monster
ideas.premise: Nana claims the Yarra River's murky waters hide a Loch Ness-style monster with a taste for discarded Four'N Twenty pies.
ideas.why_funny: A ridiculous monster with very specific, very Melbourne, culinary tastes.

ideas.title: Seagull Mafia
ideas.premise: Nana reveals that the seagulls at Brighton Beach are not just after chips, but are actually a highly organized crime syndicate.
ideas.why_funny: Seagulls running a protection racket for beachgoers' hot chips.

ideas.title: The Underwater Tram
ideas.premise: Nana swears that a sunken W-Class tram runs a secret underwater route from Port Melbourne to Williamstown.
ideas.why_funny: A ridiculously impractical and impossible mode of transport.
